title: Finance YouTuber Meet Kevin offers to pay 1M rubles to cover fine for anti-war Russian journalist - Fox Business
content:
1. Finance YouTuber Meet Kevin offers to pay 1M rubles to cover fine for anti-war Russian journalist  Fox Business
  2. Russian TV journalist who protested Ukraine war on-air turns up in court  CNN
  3. Russian journalist fined after live broadcast anti-war protest  Guardian News
  4. The one-woman protest on Russian TV proves we should stand with the Russian working class  The Independent
  5. Marina Ovsyannikova: Protester on Russian TV news is arrested  NPR
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Kevin Paffrath, the prominent YouTube finance influencer also known as Meet Kevin, is offering 1 million rubles to the Russian TV editor who photo-bombed her own network’s primetime broadcast over the weekend to share an anti-war message amid Vladimir Putin’s invasion of Ukraine.
